website_summaries.verdict: Tricks focused on illusion aspect of magic that will improve hand/eye coordination. Solidly built wood set.
pros: Tricks are easy to learn for beginners
Different tricks help develop fine motor skills
Quality of materials in the kit are better than most kids' magic kits
Tricks require some thinking, so kids won't be bored
cons: Some instructions in the box are not completely clear

customer_reviews.title: Falls far short and this is why...
customer_reviews.text: This magic kit could have been the very best! Unfortunately, it's very poorly built. All the measurements are way off. For example, as you can see in the picture, this inside block should fill the outer one, but instead it doesn't even come close. Sadly, all of the effects are like that! It makes many of the tricks unworkable. The illustrations in the instructions correctly depict how the props should be... yet aren't. Yes it's a children's magic kit, but for me that just makes me want to demand better quality... And so should you.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my 7 year old and he LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a magic kit that was sturdy, but easy enough to understand, yet wasn't full of cheap tricks and this Magic Set was just PERFECT!! It is sturdy, almost heavy (for a 7 year old), but it keeps him entertained for hours! My only negative would be it needs a clasp or lock for the case, so it can be easily transported. Currently it all fits in the magic box, but the box doesn't lock or clasp close and it has been dropped a few times with coins and rags and tricks rolling everywhere. STILL, give it 5 stars for how well it is made! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: JenGee

customer_reviews.title: Melissa and Doug SUPERB Magic Set
customer_reviews.text: This "kit" is everything I could have wanted for making magic tricks, as a child, as a mother, as a grandmother. So finely crafted! And the tricks are quite clever. I just bought it for my just six year old grandson for birthday and Chanukah. I think, covetous person that I am with one foot in the grave, that I had the toy for myself to show everyone (I know about 3 people) how strong handsome delightful brilliant reasonably priced . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: JillyOhio

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set thinking that it will keep my kids, 7 and 9, occupied during the coronavirus lock down. While they enjoyed showing the magic tricks, they lost interest in the set after about a day. Some tricks are clever but most are just way too simple and not interesting. I regret that I decided to spend more on this set thinking that I’m purchasing from a reputable provider, vs another brand that costs less.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Awesome magic set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter last xmas and it was a big hit. She loves it! She has gotten really good at most of them and shes 12. They tricks are fun and easy to learn. They are entertaining and fun to watch as well. Gives her great confidence and makes her the star. One of the best presents shes recieved. Still enjoys it to this day. Everything has held up. My only complaint is I did wish it came with a big bag/box for everything to go in when not in use. I purchased a little bin and that's been fine otherwise. Great, durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon&Dale

customer_reviews.title: A solid and great looking magic set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high-quality, wooden magic set I deal for young children. The tricks are not hard, the props look nice and are sturdy and durable. A lot of plastic sets are sort of overwhelming with pieces all over the place. They may contain 100 tricks, many of dubious quality. This set contains 10 tricks and the props, high-quality, in a very solid wood case. Congratulations to this developer for this wonderful set! I have been considering getting one for myself, and I am an amateur magician. The prices are unbeatably low given the quality of these props. My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: John Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it'll be great fun for my nephew's birthday.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a birthday gift for my nephew who's turning 8 this year. The last my dad visited with him he was showing him "magic" tricks using paper. So, we thought this would be a great buy for him to really feel like a magician. I can't open it to really look it over and he won't either for another couple weeks (so I may update this later.) But looking in from the outside of the package, it looks like it's pretty good quality for a kid's magic set and one of the better ones you can get off Amazon. Can't wait for him to dazzle us. ☺
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very good product ... except..no directions. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I got this sfor my grandsons 10th birthday. He loves it, and so did friends, but, there were NO DIRECTIONS in it! Nada. nothing at all. some thingss he figured out on his own, but there was nothing at all to indicate how to use the items. The prouct itself is very good, high quality, way better than any other magic sets. I would add two stars if Ihad intsruction, an illustrated sheet, or even a DVD to show how to use the set.
customer_reviews.author: Mr max

customer_reviews.title: Great box of tricks
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son and I have been enjoying this. It’s great to get wood pieces instead of plastic. There is a nice assortment of tricks. I was especially happy to get the disappearing bag. I think the directions were perfectly fine for learning the trick. What would be helpful would be videos of a real magician doing the tricks. The physical part of the tricks are easy to learn—the tricky part is the presentation. It would also be good to include a way to keep the storage box shut. Either a lock or even a bungee cord. I highly recommend this to interested magicians.
customer_reviews.author: molepoblano

customer_reviews.title: Hard to figure out the tricks!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for an 8 year old boy. He could only figure out how to effectively accomplish one trick. The rest was difficult to work with and figure out even for an adult. Well made, however but I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cindy symmonds

customer_reviews.title: Expected higher quality from M and D
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this kit and spends hours learning the tricks and performing them for us. Great for beginners but the quality control needs work. One trick was broken right out of the box. Another illusion he performed well was ruined because the box inside the box was too small.
customer_reviews.author: S. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Quality appearance and the box is great to hold everything
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandson loves it. He's just a little impatient in getting everything in there so the box will close! Wish there was a hinge on the box to keep it closed and might just try to add one. Everything in the kit is so cool! His dad helped him set everything up but I'm sure a child of that age could figure everything out for himself. Not so sure about a younger child but this is his first magic kit.
customer_reviews.author: TonTon

customer_reviews.title: We were able to do magic instantly,
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality toy (not flimsy junk). The parts are solid wood. The tricks vary in difficulty so it is fun for all ages. I highly recommend this! The only criticism I have is that it does not pack up. You can fit all the pieces in the trick box but it doesn’t latch and the toys fall out the hole. Get a good boy to put it in otherwise really wonderful for ages 6-12
customer_reviews.author: MeeMaw Terry

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my granddaughter. First attempt using the magic bag and it broke. The screws that attach the lever were not usable, the holes were stripped when I attempted to repair it. I bought Melissa and Doug specifically for the quality even with the higher price. I would not recommend this product, doesn't work!
customer_reviews.author: TRB

customer_reviews.title: Lots of tricks and great quality items included in this set
customer_reviews.text: This magic set definitely is oodles and oodles of fun for little ones. The instructions are easy to understand and to watch them perform these tricks really is more that worth the price of the set. Like all Melissa and Doug products, the quality of the items included are above those you would receive from other sets. There are plenty of trick in here to keep them busy for a long time. I will say this is definitely one of the best presents that Santa brought this year!
customer_reviews.author: NYC Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful, excellent quality, and great instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a quality product. No cheap plastic here and nothing cartoonish; virtually everything is made of wood and/or cloth and exquisitely painted. The box that holds everything, and doubles as a "table" for performing the tricks, is also excellent quality. The instructions are the best I've seen. My kids have had other magic sets where the instructions were so poor and the materials so cheaply made that it spoiled the whole effect. This set is so attractive and professional that my son used it to perform several tricks in a talent show at our church, to wild applause! Best set on the market for kids.
customer_reviews.author: seagull

customer_reviews.title: We were happy to see the product is all that it says ...
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time with no damage. I ordered this product for my nine year old granddaughter as she loves to play with magic. We were happy to see the product is all that it says it is...very colorful and full of many different magic tricks for hours of fun. This product is made of very high quality materials that is not easily destroyed by young children. It feels very smooth and nice to the touch for young children to handle. I am very pleased with this product and so happy I ordered it for her. She loves it and is having so much fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen fraser

customer_reviews.title: Traditional Chinese Craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: Remember when "Made in China" meant "Junk" ? This product carries on that tradition. I gave it two stars because it has lots of tricks that will still work and it is really cheap. The quality and workmanship is just really bad.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: GReat Magic Set for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter asked only for a magic set for Christmas. We had done a lot of research into what would be good for a 6 year old. In the end we chose the Melissa and Doug set. We can't be happier. There are many simple tricks in this set that she was able to learn with my help on the first day. There are a few more difficult tricks, but that makes this the perfect set as she has some challenge and needs to learn them through practice. Would be very easy to add more individual tricks from elsewhere in the future. I only wish the box had a clamp on it for storage purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Great magic set!
customer_reviews.text: Most magic sets are junk, but our son was really interested in magic so we took a chance with this one based on reviews. The pieces are sturdy and very nice looking. Our 9 year old was able to read the simple directions and figure out the illusions on his own. When he "preformed" them for us we were impressed with the results and really wondered how he did the trick. All the pieces fit nicely in the box and most are wood so even a year later all the pieces are intact and in great condition. Very impressed with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old has suddenly taken an interest in magic, and was dying to have this set. All but one of the tricks is age appropriate for him. He’s good with numbers and adding for his age, if not, I’d say two of the tricks are probably more geared for 8+ But the kit is overall really cute, everything worked great, fits together, and is definitely worth $27.
customer_reviews.author: staciamikele

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this. The magic tricks are easy enough and everything is well made and durable. I remember my magic kit as a child. The tricks were so complicated for a child that we never learned most of them. Also there were tons of small pieces that were lost within weeks. With this kit, everything is nice and big and the directions are fairly simple. My 8 year old needed a little help but after a few tries he got it. My kids love performing in front of our guests. What a great set!
customer_reviews.author: RyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6yr old grandson and it t was hard to tell who had more fun with it-my adult children or grandchildren! I purchased two more sets so Each family will have one! The tricks were easy to learn but the numbered card trick requires some advanced math (adding) skill. And for the kids I definitely recommend purchasing the Melissa and Doug magician’s costume as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gorgeous

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality, lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my great grandson , he loved it, but I have to tell you, I loved playing with it probably just as much,even when he wasn’t here ! Very good quality, NOT cheaply made. Doesn’t fall apart like other magic sets I’ve had. I / we love this
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cute but complicated.
customer_reviews.text: This set has its pros and cons. It is nice quality and great for a young beginner. The packaging is a bit awkward, though. They pack a lot into the bix, but it's hard to get it all back in and it falls out of the side or too easily. This isn't meant to be put away somewhere, it's meant to be displayed and placed somewhere. But my child has had a fun time with it.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Good tricks bad storage
customer_reviews.text: Great tricks but again Melissa and Doug fail in the storage fashion. All this needs is a latch to hold the box closed. Every Melissa and Doug product confuses me as to why they don’t add a lid or a latch.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality - Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 9 year old grandsons birthday. The tricks are good and are made very well and will last through a young persons learning how to do them. We are very pleased with the product and looking forward to helping our grandsons be able to feel good about doing the magic tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Byam

customer_reviews.title: A hit with an 8 year old boy!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my nephew as a gift. He LOVED it! He spent the whole rest of the day playing with it and doing a magic show for us and his grandparents. Good quality items, LOTS of different tricks! The instructions were clear enough that he could read them on his own and then perform the trick. He was planning to practice some of them so he could do them more smoothly in front of others. It was money well spent as it promoted creativity and interaction with others. I did purchase a hat and cape separately as those were not included.
customer_reviews.author: LOVELOVELOVE

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas for my grandson. He loves to do magic and play tricks. I couldn’t believe how much was in this set for the price. He was showing us all different magic tricks that day. We had a good time with our New Magician in the family
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: although far superior to a cheap magic set
customer_reviews.text: Not as well made as some Melissa and Doug toys; although far superior to a cheap magic set. And the tricks, while interesting, are not easy for a young one. This might be better for a 7 year old (my child is 4, soon to be 5). But at the later age, maybe more advanced tricks would make sense.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Achour

customer_reviews.title: Best magic set around
customer_reviews.text: Best magic set around. The directions need to be better and here are some tricks in the box that were not explained in the instructions. We had to go on YouTube to figure some of them out. Note it comes with several rubber bands do not toss them out you need them for one of the tricks! The construction was great! This will last for a long time. My kids played with it for hours. Add on the Mellissa and Douge magic dress up set!
customer_reviews.author: Jdhill

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! This magic kit is great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! This magic kit is great! My 7 year old grandson is so proud to be able to actually perform the tricks and everything fits into a wooden box. The directions are easy to follow. We just love Melissa & Doug products. Everything is always top notch yet affordable. Lots of toys and learning items made from real wood with nice paint colors. My grandson really enjoys everything we've purchased from them.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Perry

customer_reviews.title: ! HHours of entertainment for my little magicians! Beautifully crafted
customer_reviews.text: I love their products and this was no exception! My sons both received these a few years apart for Christmas and had so much fun putting on magic shows for the family! The box the tricks come in as well as the tricks are beautifully painted and decorated and the tricks were all easy enough for my young kids to learn and perform by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Abracadabra
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like with this set. Nicely built, some simple tricks, some a bit more challenging. I gave it to an 8-year old girl who spent four hours with me on Christmas Day learning the tricks. She’s ready to turn pro!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Kind of hard for a kid to use with no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. According to his dad it arrived with no (0) instructions. Pretty fn useless unless they can find something on YouTube showing how a particular trick works. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Walker

customer_reviews.title: As always--top notch!
customer_reviews.text: As always--top notch! Love that this magic set is very sturdy and well designed. Our 6 year old grandson loves it--and so far, hasn't managed to break anything! There are lots of parts that requires keeping track of but so far, so good! He loves to amaze us with his tricks! Some of them are fairly challenging for him to learn, but others are rather simple--and a confidence builder. Great job, Melissa & Doug!
customer_reviews.author: Titetown

customer_reviews.title: Age appointment and easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift. The recipient wasn’t a fan but the items in the box were age appropriate and everything was very easy to learn. The other children were happy to play and learn
customer_reviews.author: Annoying

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Cute set but nothing fits back into the wooden box that’s supposed to hold it all. Tricks were somewhat difficult to learn/perform. One of the pieces easily broke. I thought my son would love this but he hasn’t looked at it since he got it for Christmas. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great box of Tricks!
customer_reviews.text: I was glad there were many different tricks. It was our entertainment for days. There is a variety, of tricks for all to be wowed. We still need to work on the magicians smooth touch. Loved the nice wooden box and stage....but would have liked a locking mechanism on it to hold it together when transporting. And a handle would be nice. Would like to have a bit more instructions on a few of the harder tricks. Watch out kids don't put some of the small pieces in the wrong trick..
customer_reviews.author: Crazy dune'r

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good magic set! It was given to my 10 year old for a Christmas gift and he has really enjoyed all the tricks. It was fun to watch him do a magic show for our family! Good quality and good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice magic set for a kid
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice magic set for a kid. My 6 y/o daughter still plays with it after almost a year. Much better than the cheap plastic junk you would find at most toy stores. I dropped a star on the review due to storage options. All the pieces are designed to pile into the large wooden box, but it's not designed to snap shut. Tipping or moving the box causes all the components to spill out in all directions.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product was WONDERFUL! I compared many similar products for my son for Christmas and was so pleasantly surprised when this arrived. It is a substantial set and pretty heavy. You can feel the quality in every piece. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Smyers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 4 or 5 year old But everything does not fit in the Box to put away
customer_reviews.text: Perfect magic set for s 4 or 5 year old. Has instructions and everything only thing I do not like is everything does not fit in the Box so storage is a pain everything falls out
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Best toy purchase ever and we purchase many, many toys!
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this yesterday and my daughter (age 9) played with it ALL DAY LONG!!! She said it was her best present ever! Be prepared to be encouraging to many, many magic trick performances. Product comes with very well made quality pieces. Couldn't recommend highly enough. Thank you Melissa and Doug for outstanding toys! Toby Cat was 2nd on the list, also! There are so many pieces to the magic kit, if you just had this one toy, your kid wouldn't be disappointed at Christmas (or for any other holiday).
customer_reviews.author: informed purchase

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our friend's seven year old who has recently gotten into magic. My husband is a magic nerd too, so he was able to work with her a lot with these. The pieces are sturdy and well-made like most Melissa and Doug items and are not too babyish and still offer some challenges for her.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Eastridge

customer_reviews.title: Quality entertainment...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a bd gift for my, now 9 yo boy and he absolutely loves it. If you're expecting some David Cooprfield level illusions, this ain't it, but if you're looking for something that will introduce a child to the world of trivks and illusions, this is it. All the pieces were there and my child was able to comprehend the instructions. Within a few minutes he was demonstrating some of the tricks in the set and he appeared to be thoroughly entertained, as were the wife and I.
customer_reviews.author: bdt

customer_reviews.title: Fun magic kit for kids
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for his 8th birthday and has had a ton of fun doing magic tricks. Great quality and lots of tricks included.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our 5 year old and lost interest very quickly. It is durable and easy to use however. I gave it 4 stars because the box that holds everything doesn’t latch making it hard to store stuff in the box as intended.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my 8 year old son and he loves it. I was happy with the product and the items that were included. It's a great little magic set and the tricks are good. It's well made and offers about 10+ tricks for them to learn. It comes with instructions on how each trick works. We had a lot of fun with this set.
customer_reviews.author: katrina french

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tricks, my son absolutely loves this! A+++
customer_reviews.text: My son has wanted this set for a long time, but it was so expensive at our local store. Finally Santa brought it for him this year, and he was so excited! And I must admit, I was excited as well. This has been entertaining us almost daily for close to a month now! My son loves the tricks, and he is able to perform them easily. A+++ will do business again!
customer_reviews.author: Jvoles

customer_reviews.title: High quality and fun
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son asked for a Magic Kit for Christmas as he is a big Burt Wonderstone fan (I know - inappropriate!) He enjoyed the kit. We somehow misplaced the directions but almost everything was simple for an 8 year old to figure out (with some help from big brothers age 11 and 15). On a snow day several weeks later we discovered a YouTube video and after that we discovered THE DIRECTIONS. Now he really loves the kit and showing off his tricks. The kit is nice quality and will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun for my grandson ... but
customer_reviews.text: some of the instructions were difficult for me to follow, never mind my grandson. And at least one of the tricks did not make sense - but overall, a good fun magic set for him
customer_reviews.author: Plumhunter

customer_reviews.title: Confusing instructions
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the quality was pretty good. However, the instructions were not very clear on how to perform some of the tricks. I did magic quite a bit as a kid/teenager, and I still couldn't figure out how a couple of the tricks were supposed to be performed. I bought this for a 6 year old, which I realize was a bit young. He was able to do the easier ones, but this would probably be best suited for a 9-12 year old.
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I always love Melissa and Doug products. They are usually so well made. Have to say this was a disappointment and I had to return it. The bad broke after using the metal switch twice. It was hard to turn to the other side and then broke. Didnt come w good directions. Just a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: My older granddaughter loved this and performed some of the easier tricks right away. Did not come with instructions but you tube has some very good how to instructions. Its a great starter set and not to expensive as compared with other sets that if she does not go any farther with magic it won't be a waste but so far she has played and practiced with it for over a month. The tricks are built well and should last.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: 8 year old kids enjoyed this gift and experimenting with all of the tricks
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old kids enjoyed this gift and experimenting with all of the tricks. The tricks were generally appropriate for an 8 year to try independently. There is a trick or two that required explanation and assistance from an adult but overall I think it has been entertaining for her. The material is of good quality and made from wood, which is nicer than plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Prime fan

customer_reviews.title: Magic tricks for 12 and older
customer_reviews.text: Magic set has a variety of fun tricks. Designed appropriate for ages 12 and older. Directions are written for adults and not kids. Quality of workmanship on tricks is mostly average.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Extremely low quality
customer_reviews.text: Items in the set I received from Amazon are poorly made and have all kind of defects - holes in the fabric, moving pieces get stuck and etc I would expect it from a random product made in China but not from a product with so many positive reviews and labeled as "Amazon's choice". The worst thing is my 5-year-old kid finds those issues in a new toy and look very confused and upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining, instructions should be better
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could mark this as 5 stars but the instructions are not thorough enough to justify that last star. However, the set is quite fun and most of the tricks can be figured out with a bit of playing around. Whenever my 7 year old pulls this out, he plays with it for an hour or two and it's great when trying to entertain 2 or 3 kids because there is plenty of tricks for all to try and show each other.
customer_reviews.author: Katie F

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.  Great gift for a kid in your life!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11-year-old son for his birthday and he really liked it. I could see younger kids liking it also. This is a very high-quality set. The solid wood pieces are SO nice compared to cheap magic sets with plastic pieces we have ordered in the past. The box is the best part - a nice-looking sturdy wood box to store everything in. If you are looking for a magic kit to give as a gift, I highly suggest this one. The sturdy pieces will last a long time and it's very high-quality
customer_reviews.author: S. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. You get what you pay for.. HOWEVER- the directions for some of the tricks are a bit confusing even for me. It’s worth buying, my son loves it, BUT it could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Pannell

customer_reviews.title: My 10 Year Old Daughter Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This magic set is great. My 10 year old daughter loves it. She was so happy opening the present for her birthday. She practiced for a couple weeks then performed for her summer camp group on talent day. A few of the tricks are kind of hard and she didn't like the box with the mirror. The props are well made and work really well. I really wish they had more tricks. I'll have to look into buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Waggener

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Magic set for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: The magic set I was looking for! Over the years I have looked for the perfect magic set for kids. And for that to happen, I have to understand how the trick works. Because if I don't understand it...how can I help show the kids (5-11) how to do it? This is the set. The instructions are easy. The tricks themselves are colorful AND DURABLE and fun! And the kids got a kick out of putting on a magic show. There's a lot in this set. And there was something for each age:4,6 & 9. I just bought another one as a family gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kids Toys purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: As always, melissa and Doug delivered a lovey and well made toy. Easy tricks and thr kids love to amaze their parents with their skill
customer_reviews.author: Nick Sheahon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loved it, I was able to easily teach her many of the tricks in this set. We have maybe two that we haven't gotten to yet. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Random411

customer_reviews.title: Very well made MAGIC set for a young magician
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and sturdy MAGIC set with all kinds of tricks and fun secret boxes decorated with mystical and mysterious things like dragons, ancient Egyptians, etc. 5 year old could do most with the help of an adult. The box it comes in doubles as storage and a place to hide the tricks behind while doing a MAGIC show.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Casa Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Great set for a beginner. The items are nicely made. The tricks and instructions are easy enough for a seven year old to figure out on his own. He loves being able to learn a new magic trick and perform it for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Set!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased that many of the props were made of real wood. They all feel sturdy and seem like they will wear well. I have to admit that my son is 9 and figuring out the directions for the acts will be a pretty steep challenge. Even I had to really study the directions and pictures! Once your child has it down they will want to put on shows for every person they meet. Adorable! Great quality for the money! Also- we recycled a vampire cape from an earlier Halloween costume, and I bought a separate top hat from amazon, it really completed the look!
customer_reviews.author: DietCokeisafoodgroup

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great value!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is "WOW". I bought this set for my 7 and 1/2 year old daughter as an intro to magic. When I was this age and a very shy introvert I discovered magic as an incredible boost to my self-esteem. This kit is a "throwback" to some classic old-fashioned tricks. The kit itself is well-built with high-quality wood construction. The instructions are clear with words and drawings. A few tricks are still a challenge but she will grow into them. This has been her most used holiday gift and one of my best purchases ever here on Amazon. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Best magic set we have seen in stores
customer_reviews.text: My kids (ages 8 and 7) both brought this set in for their talent shows at school. The tricks are very well made and so far the other students have been really impressed and entertained watching the magic show. One thing that I like is the engineering that went into creating the boxes. My oldest son has been studying how they are made and has spent a few hours trying to come up with his own trick architecture. I have really enjoyed watching the creativity this set sparks!
customer_reviews.author: Ben n Kim

customer_reviews.title: ... well made magic set and the tricks are really good! I bought it for a 7 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made magic set and the tricks are really good! I bought it for a 7 year old and she loved it as did her 10 year old sister. The only bad part is that an adult needs to read the instructions and figure out how to do the tricks first. A youtube video of the tricks would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Magic tricks for youngsters
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it. With a little adult help, kids loved it. It is not beyond the scope of understanding for a six year old.
customer_reviews.author: PICKLES

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this magic set for my 7 year old grandson for Christmas. He unwrapped it yesterday and was trying to learn the tricks today. Unfortunately one of the tricks, cylinder squeeze is missing parts - the green and blue cylinder. That trip is unusable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality wooden pieces will last. Tricks are at different skill levels so they can do some immediately and work on practicing harder ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Craven

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a wide variety of ages!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson love it. We are introducing the easier tricks first. As he masters them, we add more. We showed him youtube videos to get ideas for a "stage presence" and now he performs for us. His 2.5 year brother imitates him and it is so cute I cannot stand it.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Magical gift!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is sturdy and well-made. The tricks are cute and easy to learn--some are easier than others which helps get them engaged right away. We bought this for our son, who is 9 and had a magician birthday party, and he loves it. I would say the age range is around 7-11ish, as my 11 year old son thinks it's pretty neat too. Wish it came with a plain magic wand--that's the only thing my sonn wanted in addition to the kit. Had to reinforce the bag seams after just a few uses but otherwise it's still a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good begining tricks. No experience and able to understand instructions and operate tricks.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. Love that it's made of wood and cloth instead of plastics. All of the tricks work... You'll have to practice to really do the tricks well but my 7 year old and I were able to figure out all of the instructions and make the tricks function as they are supposed to. Definitely recommend for beginning magicians.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: This is my absolute favorite gift. I bought one for my 7 year ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite gift. I bought one for my 7 year old son on his birthday and then bought 2 more for his friends. Easy for even my 7 year old to learn and he loves amazing us with his magic tricks!
customer_reviews.author: Devaney S LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: great magic set
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this set for several different children in my life-both girls and boys. All of them love it! It's very user friendly and easy to learn the range of tricks contained in the box. Comes with a mini-stage/platform and magic wand. Younger kids will likely need some help learning the tricks (ie: needing an adult to read the instructions and teach them what to do), but they will likely be able to master most if not all of them , with this help. Even when you know how the tricks work, it's still fun to watch the child perform them!
customer_reviews.author: Heather AF Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Super fun tricks that my 8 year old can do ...
customer_reviews.text: Super fun tricks that my 8 year old can do quickly. The quality is great. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. The price is on point and the wooden box is sturdy and able to keep all the equipment in. I would take a half star away for the box being splintered. I will have to sand it down before my kids get hurt..
customer_reviews.author: khar

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT set for an 8 year-old boy
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT set for an 8 year-old boy. The tricks work and they are sturdy and there are not a zillion tiny pieces to keep up with. Trust me, 10 good quality tricks are better than 100 crappy ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff's Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This magic set by far exceeded my expectations. All of the pieces are of high quality and they look very professional. I bought this for my 10 year old son and we've both had a lot of fun practicing the tricks to make them seamless. I would highly recommend this set. My only "complaint" is that it comes in a hinged wooden box, but the box does not have a latch to keep it shut. This would make it great for storing all the pieces. Otherwise, it was a super purchase and I plan to buy the smaller kit for his birthday. Another quality Lisa and Doug product.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Covarrubias Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect learner set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute set & my 8 year old lit up when he was learning the tricks! Must have, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Tricks worked
customer_reviews.text: My grandson enjoyed these tricks. Some tricks could have been better made.
customer_reviews.author: jimaz

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 5 year old budding magician grandson. He absolutely loved it and I loved the quality !
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: I’d say 80% of the tricks are cool and work for a child his age
customer_reviews.text: My second grader got this at Christmas. I’d say 80% of the tricks are cool and work for a child his age. The magic number cards are already showing wear as the painted numbers are getting harder to read. The box acts as a nice prop and a storage case.
customer_reviews.author: MegSLP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect "Starter" Magic Set
customer_reviews.text: My son is six, and I searched pretty hard to find a set that I thought was of the appropriate age level for him, I picked out three and he chose this one from the three. He is very happy with it, and it gets a lot of use. It was easy to teach him the tricks and he can perform all of them with out getting frustrated, a huge plus; and there are plenty of tricks in the box. It is very sturdy and well made, as I have found of all Melissa& Doug products. We like it so much, we have bought the set for birthday gifts for his friends.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves playing with this and performing her little "shows"! Instructions on some of the items were a little tougher, but there are some YouTube videos out there that help show you how it's done. Items are well made and quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great! My 8 year old daughter plays with it at least once a week and puts on “magic shows”. The instructions were mostly easy enough for her to understand, there were a few tricks she needed adult help figuring out the first time, but was fine other than that. I’m definately glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Virgo-Wonderland

customer_reviews.title: Well built and the tricks all work!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and the tricks all work. Some of them are a little corny/too simple but it's also aimed at pretty young children. Worth the money though if you're wanting a sturdy magic kit for the wannabe magician in your household.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set. I got it for my 9 year old daughter. She loved it! She was able to follow instructions in most of the tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This product was very usable for a 6 year old, but also very durable for the young magician to show all of his friends. Everything fit into the wooden box it came with for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: The kids LOVED this set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my nephew's birthday which is in November. It was such a hit with all of the kids so it was only logical that the following month for Christmas we purchased a few more and used them as gifts. That was 3 years ago and the kids are still playing with these. Melissa and Doug items are really well made. Can be a bit on the expensive side with some items however you get what you pay for. Definitely a big winner in our family.
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun! Easy to learn ( please read how)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 5/8 yr old nephews. We had so much fun with it! Many different magic tricks and if the instructions are hard to figure out you can YouTube them! Good quality and most tricks can take a rough handling. A few tricks have little parts. Choking hazard to younger kids. Overall very happy:)
customer_reviews.author: jDizzle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a bit young for this but she will grow into it and can do some of the simpler tricks. I love that it's compact and easy to store all together.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magic set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set. Well made. Easy to follow directions. Fun for a very smart 7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel Kaier

customer_reviews.title: Good value.  Kid friendly.  Will require some adult assistance.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves it. Most of the tricks need an adult to explain to the child. Few kids will be able to figure out how to do the tricks on their own. However, with very little effort, most kids should be able to do the tricks quite well. Plus, the set includes a lot of tricks for that price. In the mall, they charge for 1 trick what this entire set cost.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Both my sons, 8 and 12 years old, had fun with this magic set!
customer_reviews.author: cmh

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! My 8-year old grandson absolutely loves this set! Directions are easy to understand and the solid wood box makes it look very special. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tah-Dah!  Nice set for the money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 7 year old daughter for her birthday, and she loves it. Really impressed with the build quality, it seems to be holding up to her repeat performances. Nice sturdy wooden box is also holding up. The tricks are pretty simple and with some help from mom and dad she is more than able to perform the tricks. I would recommend this product for 7 and above as a nice starter kit for them to get into magic, Simple and straightforward.....
customer_reviews.author: RonS

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Deluxe Magic Set
product_meta.description:
This fantastic set includes 10 professional caliber, yet easy-to-master, tricks for beginners! Young magicians will improve their confidence and fine motor skills as they amaze family and friends with exciting tricks and illusions! "Secret Silks," "Magic Number Prediction," “Egyptian Prediction” are among the ten classic tricks included. Say the magic word and this fabulous set can be yours! The process of preparing and performing their magic act is ideal for building confidence and poise, as well as exercising creativity and dramatic flair as they take the stage to perform. Sturdy wooden pieces, thick-woven rope, and shatterproof mirrors mean this high-quality set is built to stand up to countless “rehearsals.” The classic nature of the tricks also means they won’t seem stale or babyish as kids grow. They’re sure to be loved for years to come. Children will get a kick out of seeing the very same acts performed by “real” magicians at professional magic shows. The Melissa & Doug Deluxe Magic Set makes an ideal gift for kids ages 8 years and up. Add the Melissa & Doug Discovery Magic Set to inspire hours of hands-on, screen-free play. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” Today, Melissa & Doug is proudly partnering with the American Academy of Pediatrics to foster early brain development and help children build important life skills through play.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
feature_bullets: TEN CLASSIC TRICKS: This set features 10 magic tricks, including Disappearing Ball, Magic Coin Box, Secret Silks, Great Escape, Magic Number Prediction, Money Maker, Egyptian Prediction, Vanishing Zone, Cylinder Squeeze, and Vanishing Coin.
STEP-BY-STEP INSTRUCTIONS: The kid-friendly instructions bring these famous tricks within reach, giving children all of the tools they need to succeed.

STURDY CONSTRUCTION AND EASY STORAGE: The sturdy solid-wood construction and the beautiful artwork make this a special kids magic set. Use the hinged box to store materials and to serve as a performance space.
GIFT FOR AGES 8 AND UP: The Melissa & Doug Deluxe Magic Set makes an ideal gift for kids 8 years and up. Add the Melissa & Doug Discovery Magic Set to inspire hours of hands-on, screen-free play.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News calls “the gold standard in early childhood play.”

100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: We design every toy to the highest-quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!
Recommended Age Range 8 Years and up
